TopicTitle: Accepted content for discussion in space lounge section.

Articles.Content:
I want to discuss a game I play in the space lounge section of the forum, however the rules did not specify whether it is suitable to post such content.

The game in question is [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ARMA_3](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ARMA_3)

It is rated 16 by PEGI and Mature by ESRB.
It is fine to discuss other games even if their age rating is a bit higher than KSP's, as long as everyone stays within our community rules in their posts (e.g. no swearing or adult content).
